attributes.title: This app was not very good
attributes.review: I tried to show my support to our loving president Donald Trump but it seems that I actually disliked the app I didn’t seen connected to my president as the app should and it took forever to download and my connection was great. No wonder this app has only one star but if the trump administration does read this you’re app needs to be banned😁🥰

FAKE NEWS!!!!!

attributes.title: Just don’t get it
attributes.review:
If I could give it negative stars I would but sadly that ain’t allowed.
As soon as I opened to app it asked for a number, after that  keep getting random calls. Then I was scrolling through the app and got a virus the “trump virus.”
I came to my sense that I don’t need negativity in my life and that I ain’t racist. don’t get this app. 
Black lives matter 
Abolish Ice

attributes.title: your worst nightmare
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and then once it did, what I saw was shocking. There is evidence that Donald Trump is in cohorts with President Snow from the Capitol to start a hunger games here in the US. I plan to evade becoming a tribute by saying I have bone spurs. I hope awareness is raised about this pressing issue that threatens us all and this app is removed before his manifesto is spread further. *three-finger salute*

attributes.title: looks and smells bad
attributes.review: this is absolutely the worst app i have on my phone. it’s disorganized, with no clear instructions on how to navigate. tr*mp supporters need more assistance and instructions as they cannot think for themselves. the app is FULL of fascist propaganda. nothing educational or progressive about it. mostly just a nonfunctional app that takes up space on my phone (similar to tr*mp).

attributes.title: This app broke my phone 😱
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to get 𝕖𝕕𝕦𝕔𝕒𝕥𝕖𝕕 but then my phone started cursing me out! I was SHOCKED. It started called me a “Homeless ew ew girl” IDEK WHAT THAT MEANS! Then all of a sudden hot men started popping up on my screen. Hot 𝒶𝓃𝒾𝓂ℯ men 🤤. I was kinda happy then the app started dissing the anime boys. I cried so hard I died. I am writing this review in hell. I have never been so disrespected in my life. Bad app never downloading it again. 😡✨

attributes.title: Had high hopes...
attributes.review: Unfortunately I had so many problems with this app, it asked for too much personal info that I was not comfortable giving. I had high hopes when downloading because I really wanted to support his 2020 campaign but the app was so hard to navigate and was just cluttered as hell. Too bad the app isn’t easy to work with 😢

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: I took a walk down my street a little bit ago. It was so quiet in the snow, in the street, with no one else outside. I don’t know why but I thought of him in this moment as I stood by myself for a bit, looking down in the direction of the street he lived on a little more than a few years ago. I missed her. I still miss her
